General.Name: Entyr Ltd.
General.Description: Entyr Limited, a clean conversion technology company, converts tires into secondary products in Australia. The company operates in two segments, Tyre Processing and Manufacturing. It converts tires into fuel oil, steel, recovered carbon black, and energy. The company was formerly known as Pearl Global Limited. Entyr Limited is based in Stapylton, Australia.

4.Name: Mr. Phillip James MacLeod ASA, B.Bus., CPA, M.A.I.C.D., MAICD
4.Title: Company Sec.
